mapper.sql: r.id as r_id, r.create_date as r_create_date, r.update_check as r_update_check, r.update_date as r_update_date, r.log_user as r_log_user, r.title as r_title, r.name as r_name, r.gender as r_gender, r.birth as r_birth,r.identity_card as r_identity_card, r.race as r_race, r.marriage as r_marriage, r.hukou as r_hukou, r.hukou_address as r_hukou_address, r.hukou_status as r_hukou_status, r.address as r_address, r.zipcode as r_zipcode, r.phone as r_phone, r.email as r_email, r.qq as r_qq, r.disability_category as r_disability_category, r.disability_card as r_disability_card, r.disability_level as r_disability_level, r.disability_part as r_disability_part, r.work_ability as r_work_ability, r.home_town as r_home_town, r.political_status as r_political_status, r.age as r_age, r.height as r_height, r.weight as r_weight, r.education as r_education, r.major as r_major, r.school as r_school, r.zhi_cheng as r_zhi_cheng, r.shi_ye_hao as r_shi_ye_hao, r.experts as r_experts, r.training as r_training, r.experience as r_experience, r.work_experience as r_work_experience, r.self_evaluation as r_self_evaluation, r.job_nature as r_job_nature, r.desire_job as r_desire_job, r.desire_address r_desire_address, r.desire_salary as r_desire_salary, r.provide_food_and_room as r_provide_food_and_room, r.provide_room as r_provide_room, r.provide_food as r_provide_food, r.provide_insurance as r_provide_insurance, r.provide_other as r_provide_other, r.work_shift as r_work_shift, r.state as r_state, r.is_default as r_is_default, r.check_status as r_check_status, r.view_count as r_view_count, r.career_test r_career_test, r.process_state as r_process_state, u.id as u_id, u.login_name as u_login_name, u.pass_word as u_pass_word, u.identity as u_identity, a.code as a_code, a.name as a_name
resume as r , user as u, area as a

mapper.delete: delete from resume where id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update:
update resume
update_date = now(),
log_user = #{logUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{gender, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birth = #{birth, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
identity_card = #{identityCard, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
race = #{race, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
marriage = #{marriage, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hukou = #{hukou, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hukou_address = #{hukouAddress, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hukou_status = #{hukouStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zipcode = #{zipcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qq = #{qq, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
disability_category = #{disabilityCategory, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
disability_card = #{disabilityCard, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
disability_level = #{disabilityLevel, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
disability_part = #{disabilityPart, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
work_ability = #{workAbility, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
home_town = #{homeTown, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
political_status = #{politicalStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
age = #{age, jdbcType=INTEGER},
height = #{height, jdbcType=FLOAT},
weight = #{weight, jdbcType=FLOAT},
education = #{education, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
major = #{major, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
school = #{school, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zhi_cheng = #{zhiCheng, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shi_ye_hao = #{shiYeHao, jdbcType=VARCHAR},

desire_job = #{desireJob, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
desire_address = #{desireAddress, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
desire_salary = #{desireSalary, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
provide_food_and_room = #{provideFoodAndRoom, jdbcType=TINYINT},
provide_room = #{provideRoom, jdbcType=TINYINT},
provide_food = #{provideFood, jdbcType=TINYINT},
provide_insurance = #{provideInsurance, jdbcType=TINYINT},

check_status = #{checkStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
view_count = #{viewCount, jdbcType=INTEGER},
career_test = #{careerTest, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
process_state = #{processState, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
uid = #{user.id, jdbcType=INTEGER},
acode = #{area.code, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_check = update_check + 1
where id= #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER} and update_check = #{updateCheck, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select from where and r.id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
